name: Age of Conan: Hyborian Adventures
description:
Age of Conan: Hyborian Adventures is a RPG massively multiplayer game developed by Funcom. It came out on 20-05-2008. Eidos Interactive published the game. Age of Conan: Hyborian Adventures has a Metascore of 80, based on professional reviews. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
Age of Conan: Hyborian Adventures is available on PC.
Composer and Knut Avenstroup Haugen scored the game.
